page.title: 16WORK IN A RURAL AREA.
page.content: Not many years ago the main type of employment in this area was farmwork. However, with the increasing use of {machinery, computer technology}and {higher wages,}there are fewer workers required on the farm. Many of the farmers whom we visited now employ fewer workers than they did about ten years ago, some only half the number.One farmer said that he has kept the same work-force, but has now doubled the size of his{dairy herd. Today's agricultural worker is more likely to specialize in some aspect of farm work or management, rather than be a general labourer. Farming today is very highly skilled work. The{population}of this rural area is changing as country people move to the towns looking for other jobs,while the town people move out,prefering to live in the quieter rural areas.
